rect.title: Firewall - Typically lead times have a long duration, best to request them ahead of time.
Database scripts, schema updates, should be executed ahead of time and validated.
The CI-CD pipeline should be executed to validate the build and automation processes.

text.tspan: * This release is addressing lead times for firewall rules.
* The first rule will be application connectivity to Postgres database.
* This will also play a role of establishing pipeline to production.
* Error Handling, Observability, Monitoring, Metrics & Logging
